long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pando network blockchain wallet chrome extension is used for sending, recieving, staking ptx here at one click. Use extension for easy accesibility and doing your stuff securely without exposing things too many to other. It is your personal wallet and can used on click with authentication each time you open it. Once your stuff is completed then you can just click else where and do your other stuff. Chrome extension provides safe way and one time user accessiblity to Pando network wallet.
